title: T210's and other type tobacco cards
author: Myachelydra

posts.post_title: T210's and other type tobacco cards
posts.post_content:
Hey Everyone,

We are in the process of uploading new inventory to the website...to this point about 350 pieces have been added since the beginning of the summer.  Check it out when you have the chance. 

[url]http://www.msbsportscards.com[/url]

We have added 75 T210's from series 1-6 (many are the highest graded specimens), a group of N300 Mayo's Cut Plug with a number of HOFers,   prewar type cards, T207's, and much more.
